name: tiktok_search
description: Search for videos on TikTok. Returns up to 10 results with title/description, creator, views, likes, and thumbnail URL.

steps.code: const results = []; const items = document.querySelectorAll('[data-e2e="search_video-item"], .search-card-container'); for (let i = 0; i < Math.min(items.length, 10); i++) { const el = items[i]; const descEl = el.querySelector('[data-e2e="search-card-desc"] a, .card-desc a, a[title]'); const creatorEl = el.querySelector('[data-e2e="search-card-user-unique-id"], [data-e2e="creator-uniqueid"], .author-uniqueid, span.creator'); const viewsEl = el.querySelector('[data-e2e="search-card-like-count"], .video-count, strong.view-count'); const likesEl = el.querySelector('[data-e2e="search-card-like-count"], .like-count'); const thumbEl = el.querySelector('img[src*="tiktokcdn"], img.poster, picture img'); const linkEl = el.querySelector('a[href*="/video/"], a[href*="/@"]'); results.push({ description: descEl ? descEl.textContent.trim().substring(0, 300) : '', creator: creatorEl ? creatorEl.textContent.trim() : '', views: viewsEl ? viewsEl.textContent.trim() : '', likes: likesEl ? likesEl.textContent.trim() : '', thumbnail: thumbEl ? thumbEl.src : '', url: linkEl ? linkEl.href : '' }); } return { query: '{{query}}', result_count: results.length, results: results }
steps.name: search_results
steps.label: Extract search results
